flawed_nl_solution:
Connie spent 10 tickets on earbuds + 15 tickets on glow bracelets = <<10+15=52>>52 tickets.
Since Connie spends half of her tickets on a stuffed koala bear, that means the 52 tickets she spent on earbuds and glow bracelets is the other half, so she spent 52 tickets on the stuffed koala bear.
In all, Connie spent 52 tickets on earbuds and glow bracelets + 52 tickets on a stuffed koala bear = <<52+52=104>>104 tickets.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
